data.name: asamodule_random
data.marketing: Shows random properties in an ASAModule widget/module. Useful for generating visits to lots of properties that might otherwise not be seen.
data.description: Widget. Shows random properties in an ASAModule widget/module. Use the arguments 'asamodule_random_listlimit' to control the number of properties shown, and 'asamodule_random_ptype_ids' to only show random properties of a specific property type.  Use asamodule_popular_vertical=1 if the module would be used with a vertical layout. CMS agostic replacement for jomres_ngm_random.
data.change_log: v1.1 Added vertical layout option.  v1.2 improved queries for working with PDO. v1.3 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.4 Globals cleanup and jr_gettext related changes. v1.5 Added Shortcode related changes. 1.6  Modified how array contents are checked. v1.8 Documentation updated
